mapper.select: SELECT ca_no, ca_nm, ca_mng, ca_mng_ph, ca_bsns_num FROM CM_ACCOUNT WHERE CA_TYP = '매입처' ORDER BY ca_no

SELECT ca_no, ca_nm, ca_mng, ca_mng_ph, ca_bsns_num FROM CM_ACCOUNT WHERE CA_TYP = '매입처'
AND ca_no LIKE '%' || #{caNo} || '%'
AND ca_nm LIKE '%' || #{caNm} || '%'
ORDER BY ca_no

SELECT cmm.cmm_cd, cmm_nm, cmm_typ, cmm_spec, cmm_unit, cmm_saf_stc, MOT_CNT, MIN_CNT, ca_nm, cmm.ca_no, TO_NUMBER(min_cnt) - TO_NUMBER(mot_cnt) AS "cmm_inven" FROM cm_account ca JOIN cm_mtrl_mng cmm ON ca.ca_no = cmm.ca_no JOIN cm_mtrl_lot clot ON cmm.cmm_cd = clot.cmm_cd JOIN mtrl_otpt mot ON clot.cml_nm = mot.cml_nm JOIN mtrl_input min ON mot.min_cd = min.min_cd WHERE 1 = 1
AND ca_nm LIKE '%' || #{caNm} || '%'
AND cmm_nm LIKE '%' || #{cmmNm} || '%'
ORDER BY cmm_cd

SELECT DISTINCT mod.ca_no, ca_nm, mo.mo_cd, mo_reo_dt, mo_title, mo_cplt_dt FROM mtrl_order mo JOIN mtrl_order_detail mod ON mo.mo_cd = mod.mo_cd JOIN cm_account ca ON mod.ca_no = ca.ca_no WHERE 1=1
AND mo_reo_dt BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
AND ca_nm LIKE '%' || #{caNm} || '%'
ORDER BY 1 asc

SELECT mo.mo_cd, mo_title, mo_reo_dt, mod.cmm_cd, mo_req_dt, mod.ca_no, ca_nm ,TO_NUMBER(min_cnt) - TO_NUMBER(mot_cnt) AS "CMM_INVEN" FROM mtrl_order mo JOIN mtrl_order_detail mod ON mo.mo_cd = mod.mo_cd JOIN cm_account ca ON mod.ca_no = ca.ca_no JOIN cm_mtrl_mng cmm ON mod.cmm_cd = cmm.cmm_cd JOIN cm_mtrl_lot cml ON mod.cmm_cd = cml.cmm_cd JOIN mtrl_otpt mot ON cml.cml_nm = mot.cml_nm JOIN mtrl_input min ON mot.min_cd = min.min_cd WHERE cmm.cmm_cd = #{cmmCd}

SELECT mo.mo_cd, mod.ca_no, ca_nm, mod.cmm_cd, cmm_nm, mo_cnt, cmm_saf_stc, mo_req_dt, mod_cd, TO_NUMBER(min_cnt) - TO_NUMBER(mot_cnt) AS "cmm_inven", TO_NUMBER(min_cnt) - TO_NUMBER(mot_cnt) + TO_NUMBER(mo_cnt) "cmm_est_inven" FROM mtrl_order mo JOIN mtrl_order_detail mod ON mo.mo_cd = mod.mo_cd JOIN cm_account ca ON mod.ca_no = ca.ca_no JOIN cm_mtrl_mng cmm ON mod.cmm_cd = cmm.cmm_cd JOIN cm_mtrl_lot cml ON mod.cmm_cd = cml.cmm_cd JOIN mtrl_otpt mot ON cml.cml_nm = mot.cml_nm JOIN mtrl_input min ON mot.min_cd = min.min_cd where mo.mo_cd = #{moCd} order by 4 asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MTRL_ORDER(mo_cd, mo_title, mo_reo_dt) VALUES(#{moCd}, #{moTitle}, TO_CHAR(#{moReoDt}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'))

INSERT INTO mtrl_order_detail(mod_cd, mo_cd, mo_cnt, mo_req_dt, ca_no, cmm_cd) VALUES ('mod' || TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyMMdd') || mod_seq.NEXTVAL, #{moCd}, #{moCnt}, TO_CHAR(#{moReqDt}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{caNo}, #{cmmCd})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mtrl_order WHERE mo_cd = LOWER(#{delMocd})
DELETE FROM mtrl_order_detail WHERE mod_cd = LOWER(#{delModCd})
mapper.select:
SELECT mo.mo_cd, mi.mi_cd, mod.cmm_cd, cmm_nm, mod.cmm_cd, mi_dt, cmm_spec, cmm_unit, cmm_typ, mi_pass_cnt FROM mtrl_insp mi LEFT OUTER JOIN mtrl_order mo ON mi.mo_cd = mo.mo_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN mtrl_order_detail mod ON mo.mo_cd = mod.mo_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN cm_mtrl_mng cmm ON mod.cmm_cd = cmm.cmm_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN cm_account ca ON mod.ca_no = ca.ca_no LEFT OUTER JOIN mtrl_input min ON mi.mi_cd = min.mi_cd WHERE mi_note = '완료'
AND ca_nm LIKE '%' || #{caNm} || '%'
AND mi_dt BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
AND min.min_cd IS NULL ORDER BY mi_dt
